Function Detail

tk_range_edit_all_selected

void tk_range_edit_all_selected ( &$this, $marker_field )

Check if all markers are selected. 
Event argument 'marker_field' contains the name for the form elements
 that contain the markers. The content of markers is converted to boolean
 values.
Function Parameters:
- object $this: application
Function Info:
Returns - int 0: No marker set, 1: All markers set, 2: Some markers set.
Access - public

tk_range_edit_call

void tk_range_edit_call ( &$this )

Event handler: Call a function with array of cursors where markers were placed. 
Event argument 'marker_fields' contains the form name of all marker fields.
 'view' contains the name of the event handler to call and 'argname' its
 argument name for the array of cursors.
Function Parameters:
- object $this: application
Function Info:
See - cursor
Access - public

tk_range_edit_do_select_all

void tk_range_edit_do_select_all ( &$this, $marker_field, $val )

Select/unselect all markers.
Function Parameters:
- object $this: application
- string $marker_field: Form names of marker fields.
- boolean $val: New content of marker fields.
Function Info:
Access - public
